MissionSuccessStatements: Well done, Commander. We obviously placed our faith in the right mercenary company. We'll let you know if we have any other work for you.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: You win some, you lose some. Sometimes it's in between. I'm disappointed you couldn't complete the contract, but at least you gave it your best shot.

Description: Mack’s Mercs are a loose band of tech junkies who banded together to make a mech work, that really shouldn’t. But the success they had let them to try out more and more design ideas that the mainstream Great Houses thought were insane. Their attitudes changed once the small company started showing impressive success with their contracts. Eventually, House Davion took notice and decided to bring the unit into their sphere of influence, awarding many tough and dirty jobs the family wouldn’t normally be able to do. Mack’s Mercs are found serving the Federated Suns.
